scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && mkdir -p '/Users/mihakralj/Obsidian/Personal/.obsidian/plugins/cloudsync' && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css '/Users/mihakralj/Obsidian/Personal/.obsidian/plugins/cloudsync/'
scripts.wbuild: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Path main.js, manifest.json, styles.css -Destination 'D:/temp/testing/.obsidian/plugins/cloudsync'" && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Path main.js, manifest.json, styles.css -Destination 'D:/temp1/testing/.obsidian/plugins/cloudsync'"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
